moves.1. e4: My favorite first move, one I almost always use.
moves.2. Nf3: I open up my knight, threatening his pawn.
moves.2... d6: He protects with his pawn, a move that I wouldn't do, I would usually respond by Nc6 or Bd6.
moves.3. Nc3: I open up my other knight protecting my pawn from any possible threats.
moves.4. Be2: I am now in a position to castle.
moves.4... b6: He pushes his pawn up one square.
moves.5. d4: I threaten his pawn, he now has a choice, protect the e5 pawn with one of his pieces or take my pawn…
moves.6... Bb7: He threatens my pawn on e4, I can protect my pawn using my other pawn on f2, my bishop, or my queen, but I don't like using my queen to early unless I see a good opportunity.
moves.7. Bb5+: I check with my bishop, he now can't take my pawn due to the threat and he must block the check.
moves.7... Nbd7: He blocks with his knight - probably the best move.
moves.8... Be7: He could of taken the free pawn, but he got is bishop out of the way in order to castle.
moves.9. Re1: I protect the pawn with my rook.
moves.10. Bf4: I open up my bishop, protecting the e5 square for: e5.
moves.10... Nc5: He opens up his knight threatening my pawn on e4.
moves.11. e5: I my pawn up to e5, as planned.
moves.12. Bxe5: And I take his pawn with my own. :D
moves.12... Nfe4: His knight is in the open, but has double protection.
moves.13. Nxe4: I take his knight with my own…
moves.13... Nxe4: …And he takes mine with his own.
moves.14. f3: I threaten his knight with my pawn.
moves.15. b4: …Only to be threatened again by another one of my pawns!
moves.15... Na6: He retreats yet again, and now have the option of capturing his knight…
moves.17. Nc6: I threaten his queen with my own queen and my knight, seeing: 17. Qxd1 Ne7! 18. Kh8 Qxd1!
moves.18. Nxe7+: I capture his bishop… FOR FREE! and check his king, forcing him to move, which then allows me to capture his queen! :D
moves.20... Bb5: He threatens my rook, not seeing the free pawn I can capture.
moves.21... f6: He threatens my bishop with his pawn.
moves.22... Ba4: He threatens my pawn on c2.
moves.25. Re1: I get ready for: Bc2 Re7 - threatening his g-pawn.
moves.25... Rad8: He's planning to check me after: Re7, although checking me won't do much.
moves.26. Ree7:
I push up my rook…
And he resigns! :D What a game. I won with a bit of luck but it was a tight game in the end.
